title: Premiere: The RIVE Project – Open Road
content:
The collaborative brainchild of New Zealand singer / songwriter Christy Whelan and Israeli ambient guitarist Arli Liberman, The RIVE Project’s debut offering, Open Road, is anthemic indie pop at it’s absolute best.

Combining real hearts-on-sleeves, fists to the sky songwriting, with super slick, ambitious production, it manages to be simultaneously stadium ready whilst endearingly intimate – perfect for those summer playlists.

With their debut EP, Wanna Change, available in late September, alongside a London headline show at Sebright Arms set for 3 October, these next few months are set to be rather special for The RIVE Project. Open Road is out tomorrow (19 August) on their own label, Rive Records).
